definitions.definition: A mental disorder (in some classifications of such disorders, including ICD-11 ) that is characterized by excessive fear of or preoccupation with a serious illness, despite medical testing and reassurance to the contrary.

main_definition: ( medicine ) A mental disorder (in some classifications of such disorders, including ICD-11 ) that is characterized by excessive fear of or preoccupation with a serious illness, despite medical testing and reassurance to the contrary.
